short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ignite your screen with Deku's green flame aura, paired with striking visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power of Izuku Midoriya with fiery green energy in this electrifying live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A dynamic interface inspired by Deku’s One For All quirk, featuring vivid green flames and glowing energy bursts.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on track with a display that reflects Deku’s unstoppable determination.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore My Hero Academia-themed mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Power up your browsing experience with features as heroic and determined as Deku himself.
